title: Ultimate Water Sounds - Rain Sounds - Underwater Sounds - Water Sounds
description: 406 Premium Water Sound Effects That Will Take Your Game To The Next Level!
longDescription:
-> Listen To The Preview <-

**Limited Time: Add $5 and get our Ultimate SFX Bundle (9000+ Sounds)**


In this pack you will find 406 Water, Rain, Swimming, Bodies of water and practically everything water related! The sounds were carefully chosen out of 1000s of sounds we recorded. All sounds are game ready and were designed to bring your game to life!

 

The Pack Includes the following sounds:


Water Footsteps – 10

Water Footsteps Barefoot – 10

Rain Loop Light - 3

Rain Loop Moderate - 3

Rain Storm Loop - 3

Rain Loop Inside Car – 1

Rain Loop Inside Cabin – 1

Rain Loop Metal Roof – 1 : Sound of rain on metal roof

Rain Loop Inside House – 1

Rain Loop Inside Ship – 1: (Sound of rain while sailing the sea)

Rain Loop Underwater – 1: The Sound Of rain that hits the water above you while diving 

Splash Large – 15

Splash Medium – 15

Splash Small – 15

Underwater Loop – 5

Underwater Movement – 10: The sounds you hear when a diver or swimmer moves around under water

Waves Loop – 3

Water fall Loop – 3

Stream Loop Calm – 3

Stream Loop Moderate – 3

Stream Loop Strong – 3

Underwater Cave Loop – 2

River Loop – 3

Small Wave – 10

Medium Wave – 10

Large Wave – 10

Fountain Loop – 5

Water Bubbles – 10

Water Bubbling Loop – 3

Water Impact – 10 

Human Water Land – 10: Sound of impacting water after a jump

Ship sinking – 5

Water Impact – 10

Water Sweep Up – 10

Water Sweep Down – 10 

Swimming Stroke Sound – 10: The Sound of a hand impacting the water

Swimming Loop – 10

Diving In Sound – 10: Sound of when you transition from open air to water

Diving Out Sound – 10: Sound of when you transition from the water to open air

Drinking Water – 10

Water Dripping – 10

Flushing Toilet – 5

Diver talking – 10: The muffled sound of a person trying to speak while in water

Diver Choking – 5 

Underwater Attack – 15

Underwater Hit – 10

Diver Breathing In (Air) – 5: Sound of diver breathing in after long breathless dive

Tsunami Crashing On Shore – 2 

Diver Impact Small – 10: Sound Of Diver Impacting an object

Diver Impact Medium - 10

Diver Impact Large - 10



Hope you enjoy this pack and good luck with your game :)
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 406

Number of Audio Cues: 406

Sample rate / bit rate: (44,100 Hz)

Do Sound FX loop: (Yes - Seamlessly)


Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)

Mac: (Yes)
